duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain data quality operations to ensure excellence in team building, operations, tooling, and automation.
Participate in architecture, design, analysis, and evangelizing activities for data quality operations.
Work on hands-on development and delivery of data quality solutions.
Lead and manage complex data initiatives or projects.
Recognize business risks and communicate them to key decision-makers.
Design and implement processes and tools for data quality and assist in delivering industry best-practice solutions for input data quality.
Produce stand-alone tools for automating data quality and guide support and data onboarding teams to best practices.
Direct more junior engineers on the data quality team and assist in scaling the team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree (or higher) in Computer Science, Management Information Systems, Business Information Systems, Mathematics, or Finance related field
